data.content:
noun
plural -ties
[noncount] :the quality of being likely to succeed and reasonable to do or use
Panelists will debate the practicality of wind as a source of renewable energy.
[noncount] :the quality of being appropriate or suited for actual use
The size of the machine makes me doubt its practicality [=suitability] for use in the home.
I know you like the dressy shoes better than the sneakers, but I think you should choose based on practicality, not style.
[noncount] :the quality of being sensible in making decisions and dealing with the problems of daily life
His optimism and practicality make him a skilled businessman.
practicalities [plural] :the facts about something :the real things that have to be done or dealt with in a particular situation - usually + of
New teachers often find the practicalities [=realities] of teaching very different from the theories they learned in college.

Danh từ
tính thực tế, tính thiết thực
(số nhiều) điều thực tế; việc thiết thực
we need to start discussing practicalities
chúng ta cần bắt đầu thảo luận những việc thiết thực
